verbs.description: here why i [V: wo] n't buy a home buying a home is a big life decision and owning a home leaves you vulnerable to unpredictable expenses that eat away at your investment renting gives a predictable expense each year that you can plan around a financial planner explains how renting could work better for your goals and lifestyle eric roberge
